original: chu zla ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chu zla ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: For example, the reflection of the moon in the water is the form of the moon in the sky, but the reflection of the moon in the water does not exist.

original: de bzhin du dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen las rnam par smin pa dge ba sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen las rnam par smin pa dge ba sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste /
translated: In the same way, various pleasant maturations of virtue arise from the condition of the formation of virtuous karma.

original: ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba chu'i nang du mi 'pho ba de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid pa 'du byed rnams kyang srid pa 'du byed rnams su 'pho ba'ang ma yin la /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba chu'i nang du mi 'pho ba de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid pa 'du byed rnams kyang srid pa 'du byed rnams su 'pho ba'ang ma yin la /
translated: Just as the moon in the sky does not transfer into the water, so the formations of virtuous karma do not transfer into the formations of existence.

original: @35b las kyi srid pa'i rkyen las kyang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: @35b las kyi srid pa'i rkyen las kyang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: However, from the condition of the formations of karmic existence, the power of the maturation of existence arises.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: dper na / rma bya'i mdongs gcig las srog chags rnams la gzugs du mar snang ngo /
analyzed: dper na / rma bya'i mdongs gcig las srog chags rnams la gzugs du mar snang ngo /
translated: For example, from a single eye of a peacock feather, many forms appear to living beings.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba gcig las rnam par smin pa rnam pa du mar snang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba gcig las rnam par smin pa rnam pa du mar snang ste /
translated: In the same way, from a single virtuous action of bodhisattvas, many fruitional effects appear.

original: las kyi srid pa'i 'du byed de dag rma bya'i mdongs su mi 'pho mod kyi /
analyzed: las kyi srid pa'i 'du byed de dag rma bya'i mdongs su mi 'pho mod kyi /
translated: Those compositional activities of karmic existence do not transfer into a peacock feather.

original: de'i rkyen las rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i rkyen las rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: However, from that condition, the power of the fruitional effect of the peacock feather also arises.

original: de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid pa bsags pa'ang srid par 'pho ba ma yin yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid pa bsags pa'ang srid par 'pho ba ma yin yang /
translated: In the same way, the accumulation of virtuous karma does not transfer into existence.

original: dge ba'i las kyi srid pa la brten nas yang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dge ba'i las kyi srid pa la brten nas yang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: However, in dependence on virtuous karma, the power of the fruitional effect of existence also arises.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: dper na / shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pas nam mkha' las me tog gi char 'bab cing me tog de dag gzugs dang / dri la sogs par dbang ba nyid du 'gyur yang /
analyzed: dper na / shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pas nam mkha' las me tog gi char 'bab cing me tog de dag gzugs dang / dri la sogs par dbang ba nyid du 'gyur yang /
translated: For example, through the performance of extremely wondrous and marvelous virtuous actions, a rain of flowers falls from the sky and one gains control over those flowers in terms of their form, smell, and so forth.

original: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba byas pa de dag nam mkha'i me tog de dag tu mi 'pho ste /
analyzed: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba byas pa de dag nam mkha'i me tog de dag tu mi 'pho ste /
translated: However, those roots of virtue that are wondrous and marvelous do not transfer into those flowers in the sky.

original: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: The characteristics of the wondrous and marvelous are one thing,

original: me tog de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang gzhan no //
analyzed: me tog de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang gzhan no //
translated: and the characteristics of those flowers are another.

original: de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid pa yang yang srid pa'i dge bar 'pho ba'ang ma yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid pa yang yang srid pa'i dge bar 'pho ba'ang ma yin la /
translated: In the same way, the existence of virtuous karma does not transfer into the virtuous existence of another,

original: dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: but the power of the ripening of the karma of virtuous existence does arise.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / shin @36a *//
analyzed: dper na / shin @36a *//
translated: For example,

original: tu chos spyod pa rnams la sil snyan rnams ma bskyod par mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang sgra 'byung yang chos spyod pa de sil snyan rnams su 'pho ba ma yin te /
analyzed: tu chos spyod pa rnams la sil snyan rnams ma bskyod par mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang sgra 'byung yang chos spyod pa de sil snyan rnams su 'pho ba ma yin te /
translated: The cymbals do not transfer into the Dharma practitioners, but they make a sound by themselves for the purpose of making offerings without being played.

original: chos spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: chos spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: The characteristics of the Dharma practitioners are one thing,

original: sil snyan de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang gzhan mod kyi /
analyzed: sil snyan de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang gzhan mod kyi /
translated: and the characteristics of the cymbals are another.

original: chos spyod pa'i rkyen gyis sil snyan rnams ma bskyod par rang sgra 'byung ngo //
analyzed: chos spyod pa'i rkyen gyis sil snyan rnams ma bskyod par rang sgra 'byung ngo //
translated: However, the cymbals make a sound by themselves through the condition of the Dharma practitioners.

original: de bzhin du rab tu byas pa'i dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i 'du byed rnams yang srid pa'i 'du byed rnams su 'pho ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rab tu byas pa'i dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i 'du byed rnams yang srid pa'i 'du byed rnams su 'pho ba ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the formations of existence of virtuous actions that are well performed do not transfer into the formations of existence.

original: rab tu chos spyod pa'i rkyen gyis rab tu'ang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rab tu chos spyod pa'i rkyen gyis rab tu'ang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: However, through the condition of the well-performed Dharma practitioners, the power of the ripening of existence also arises.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / 'byung ba chen po'i dbang gis nam mkha' la 'ja' 'byung yang der 'byung ba chen po rnams 'pho ba'ang ma yin la; 'byung ba chen po'i rkyen gyis 'ja'i gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ste /
analyzed: dper na / 'byung ba chen po'i dbang gis nam mkha' la 'ja' 'byung yang der 'byung ba chen po rnams 'pho ba'ang ma yin la; 'byung ba chen po'i rkyen gyis 'ja'i gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ste /
translated: For example, by the power of the great elements, a rainbow appears in the sky, but the great elements do not move there, and by the condition of the great elements, the power of the ripening of the form of the rainbow appears.

original: de la gang kha dog skya bor snang ba de ni sa'i khams kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: de la gang kha dog skya bor snang ba de ni sa'i khams kyi dbang ngo //
translated: There, what appears as a pale color is the power of the earth element.

original: de la gang kha dog sngon por snang ba de ni chu'i khams kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: de la gang kha dog sngon por snang ba de ni chu'i khams kyi dbang ngo //
translated: There, what appears as a blue color is the power of the water element.

original: de la gang kha dog dmar por snang ba de ni me'i khams kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: de la gang kha dog dmar por snang ba de ni me'i khams kyi dbang ngo //
translated: There, what appears as a red color is the power of the fire element.

original: gang gzhu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'am /
analyzed: gang gzhu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'am /
translated: What has the shape of a bow

original: zlum por 'dug pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: zlum por 'dug pa de ni rlung gi khams kyi dbang ngo //
translated: or is round is the power of the wind element.

original: de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed byas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i dbang gis yang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i @36b dbang ba nyid 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed byas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i dbang gis yang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i @36b dbang ba nyid 'byung ngo //
translated: In the same way, by the power of the existence of virtuous karma, the power of the ripening of existence is produced.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdom pa'i rkyen gyis rin po che sna bdun dang / 'bras sa bon ma btab ma rmos par 'byung yang /
analyzed: dper na / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdom pa'i rkyen gyis rin po che sna bdun dang / 'bras sa bon ma btab ma rmos par 'byung yang /
translated: For example, the seven precious things of a universal monarch and the rice and barley that grow without planting or plowing are due to the condition of the vow of the ten virtuous actions.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdom pa rkyen du gyur pa de rin po che de rnams dang / 'bras rnams su 'phos pa'ang ma yin la /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdom pa rkyen du gyur pa de rin po che de rnams dang / 'bras rnams su 'phos pa'ang ma yin la /
translated: However, the vow of the ten virtuous actions is not transferred into those precious things and rice.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdom pa'i rkyen gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdom pa'i rkyen gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: The status of a universal monarch is also due to the condition of the vow of the ten virtuous actions.

original: de bzhin du dge ba legs par byas pa shin tu mthar phyin pa legs par brtsams pa las yang srid pa'i dge ba'i rnam par smin pa 'byung yang las kyi srid pa'ang srid par 'pho ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba legs par byas pa shin tu mthar phyin pa legs par brtsams pa las yang srid pa'i dge ba'i rnam par smin pa 'byung yang las kyi srid pa'ang srid par 'pho ba ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the virtuous ripening of rebirth occurs from virtuous actions that are well done, well completed, and well undertaken. However, the rebirth of action is not transferred into rebirth.

original: de'i phyir rnam par smin pa mi 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par smin pa mi 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúdifferent ripening.‚Äù

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: dper na / lha rab tu dge ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi me tog mand'a ra ba bskyed mi dgos pa dang / gzhal med khang bya mi dgos pa dang / bdud rtsi'i zas bsgrub mi dgos par 'byung yang dge ba'i 'du byed kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa de dag 'pho ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na / lha rab tu dge ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi me tog mand'a ra ba bskyed mi dgos pa dang / gzhal med khang bya mi dgos pa dang / bdud rtsi'i zas bsgrub mi dgos par 'byung yang dge ba'i 'du byed kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa de dag 'pho ba ma yin te /
translated: For example, the flowers of the celestial wish-fulfilling tree do not need to be produced, the celestial palaces do not need to be constructed, and the food of nectar does not need to be prepared.

original: dge ba'i 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis lha'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba 'byung ngo //üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis lha'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba 'byung ngo // 'di lta ste /
translated: However, the ripening of the karma of virtuous compositional activity is not transferred.

original: dper na / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis sgrib pa med par dbang ba nyid 'byung yang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa sgrib pa med par 'pho ba'ang ma yin la /üîΩrdzu 'phrul mngon par @37a *//
analyzed: dper na / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis sgrib pa med par dbang ba nyid 'byung yang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa sgrib pa med par 'pho ba'ang ma yin la / rdzu 'phrul mngon par @37a *//
translated: For example, the unimpeded power of those with great magical power arises due to the condition of their magical composition, but the magical composition is not transferred to the unimpeded power.

original: 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi sgrib pa med pa'ang 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi sgrib pa med pa'ang 'byung ste /
translated: For example, the unimpeded power of those with magical power arises due to the condition of their magical composition.

original: ri la sogs pa 'pho ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: ri la sogs pa 'pho ba'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not that the mountain, etc. are transferred.

original: bsams pa tsam gyis sgrib pa med par 'byung ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: bsams pa tsam gyis sgrib pa med par 'byung ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is not that they arise without obstruction merely by being thought of.

original: de bzhin du bag yod pa rnams kyi dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis yang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du bag yod pa rnams kyi dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis yang srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid 'byung ngo //
translated: In the same way, the power of the ripening of existence arises from the condition of the virtuous actions of the heedful.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / rlung gi rkyen gyis me 'byung gi /
analyzed: dper na / rlung gi rkyen gyis me 'byung gi /
translated: Fire arises from the condition of wind.

original: de med na mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: de med na mi 'byung ste /
translated: Without that, it does not arise.

original: me byung nas tshos par bya bar snang ba la sogs par rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid 'byung yang /
analyzed: me byung nas tshos par bya bar snang ba la sogs par rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid 'byung yang /
translated: After the fire arises, the power of the ripening of what is to be cooked, etc. arises.

original: me'i dbang ba de rlung dang / shing rnams la mi 'pho la /
analyzed: me'i dbang ba de rlung dang / shing rnams la mi 'pho la /
translated: But the power of the fire is not transferred to the wind and wood.

original: me la me'i dbang ba nyid yod pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: me la me'i dbang ba nyid yod pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: And the power of the fire does not exist in the fire itself.

original: de bzhin du rkyen thams cad las skyes pa'i dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'ang so sor khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rkyen thams cad las skyes pa'i dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'ang so sor khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the ripening of virtue and non-virtue arising from all conditions should be understood individually.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong dge ba zad pa med pa'i tshogs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dper na / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong dge ba zad pa med pa'i tshogs rnam par dag pa /
translated: For example, a monk who practices yoga, who has pure accumulations that are inexhaustible,

original: dbang rab tu thob pas zad par nam mkha' bsams pa tsam gyis de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbang rab tu thob pas zad par nam mkha' bsams pa tsam gyis de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: who has attained mastery, can, by merely thinking of space, transform it into whatever he wishes.

original: sra ba dang / gsher ba dang / tsha ba dang / g-yo ba rnams dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang; dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur yang /
analyzed: sra ba dang / gsher ba dang / tsha ba dang / g-yo ba rnams dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang; dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur yang /
translated: He can transform solid, liquid, hot, and moving things, as well as blue, yellow, red, and white things, into whatever he wishes.

original: sems kyi sgrib pa med pa nam mkha'i sgrib pa med par 'pho ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: sems kyi sgrib pa med pa nam mkha'i sgrib pa med par 'pho ba'ang ma yin /
translated: However, the nonobstruction of the mind is not transferred into the nonobstruction of space.

original: bsams pa tsam gyis @37b sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: bsams pa tsam gyis @37b sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin /
translated: It is not that nonobstruction is achieved by merely thinking of it.

original: sems kyi sgrib pa med pa de dang mi ldan par sra ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: sems kyi sgrib pa med pa de dang mi ldan par sra ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: The nonobstruction of the mind is not the nonobstruction of solid things and so forth.

original: de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i dge ba dang / mi dge ba thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i dge ba dang / mi dge ba thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: In the same way, one should understand the power of the ripening of all good and bad things that arise from conditions.

original: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcu po de dag gis dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcu po de dag gis dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas should understand the maturation power of virtues through these ten ways of engaging the way of Dharma.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcus zag pa med pa'i dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa 'thob pa'i dbang ba nyid khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcus zag pa med pa'i dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa 'thob pa'i dbang ba nyid khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: bodhisattvas should understand the maturation power of uncontaminated virtues through ten ways of engaging the way of Dharma.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: mngon par shes pa drug dang / rig pa gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / dbang bcu dang / bden pa bcu dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug dang / rig pa gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / dbang bcu dang / bden pa bcu dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: the six superknowledges, the three knowledges, the eight liberations, the eight spheres of mastery, the ten spheres of totality, the ten powers, the ten truths, the nine successive absorptions,

original: stobs bcu dang / shes pa bcu'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / shes pa bcu'o //
translated: the ten powers, and the ten knowledges.

original: de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six superknowledges?

original: lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa ste /üîΩ'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa drug go /
analyzed: lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa ste / 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa drug go /
translated: the knowledge of the performance of miracles,üîΩand the knowledge of the extinction of the outflows.

original: de la byang chub sems @38a *//
analyzed: de la byang chub sems @38a *//
translated: These are the six superknowledges of the bodhisattvas.

original: dpa'i lha'i mig gang zhe na /
analyzed: dpa'i lha'i mig gang zhe na /
translated: What is the bodhisattvas‚Äô divine eye?

original: dge ba'i tshogs thams cad bsags pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i tshogs thams cad bsags pa /
translated: It is the accumulation of all that is wholesome,

original: ma nyams pa /
analyzed: ma nyams pa /
translated: unimpaired,

original: chags pa med pa /
analyzed: chags pa med pa /
translated: unattached,

original: tshad med pa /üîΩsgrib pa med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa / sgrib pa med pa /
translated: boundless,üîΩunobstructed,üîΩunwavering,

original: gnas pa med pa /üîΩrma med pa /üîΩ'khrul pa med pa /
analyzed: gnas pa med pa / rma med pa / 'khrul pa med pa /
translated: unwounded,üîΩunconfused,

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: indemonstrable,

original: ma byung ba /

original: @53b gang la gnas nas 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: @53b gang la gnas nas 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: de chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par mthong ngo //

analyzed: de chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gag par mthong nas yang mi 'jug mi ldog go /

analyzed: de de'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su dag pa yin no //

analyzed: de de las gong du lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug ste /

original: sdug bsngal smon pa @60a *//
analyzed: sdug bsngal smon pa @60a *//

original: med par shes pa /

analyzed: brtsegs par shes pa 'di ni phung po shes pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: gzhan yang / gzugs kyi phung po la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur shes pa dang / tshor ba'i phung po la chu'i chu bur lta bur shes pa dang / 'du shes kyi phung po la smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang / 'du byed kyi phung po la chu shing lta bur shes pa dang /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, the knowledge of the aggregate of form is the knowledge that it is like a mass of foam. The knowledge of the aggregate of feeling is the knowledge that it is like a water bubble. The knowledge of the aggregate of perception is the knowledge that it is like a mirage. analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la sgyu ma lta bur shes pa 'di ni phung po shes pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings g-yo ba ni ma yin te /

analyzed: gang de ltar shes pa 'di ni khams shes pa zhes bya'o // gzhan yang / phra ba shes pa dang / rags pa shes pa dang / chung du @61a *//

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni sgra 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin /

analyzed: sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings te /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni mnom pa ma yin /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pas thob pa ma yin @61b no //

translated: By the perfection of vows, one obtains the recollection of one's past lives in all one's rebirths, the ability to go wherever one wishes, and the ability to delight others as one wishes.

translated: By the perfection of power, one attains the state of being unassailable by any afflictions, any demons, or any opponents, and one attains the state of being exalted above the entire world.
